message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional item. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.

Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $15000 is a bit above my budget.  I'm happy to pay $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend.  Let me know if you're open to that price.  I'm eager to finalize this deal.
